name: UISceneSession.Role
desc: Constants that indicate the possible roles for a scene.

items.name: static let windowApplication: UISceneSession.Role
items.desc: A scene that displays interactive windows on the device's main screen.

items.name: static let windowExternalDisplay: UISceneSession.Role
items.desc: A scene that displays noninteractive windows on an externally connected screen.

items.name: static let carTemplateApplication: UISceneSession.Role
items.desc: A scene that displays interactive content on a CarPlay-enabled vehicle screen.

items.name: static let CPTemplateApplicationDashboardSceneSessionRoleApplication: UISceneSession.Role
items.desc: A scene that displays navigation content on the CarPlay Dashboard.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a scene role with the specified raw value.
